issue.title: Rename “Pyre” node to “Pyrefly” (next iteration of Pyre)

labels.name: topic-change
labels.description: Missing or deprecated topics in roadmap

issue.body:
### Roadmap URL

https://roadmap.sh/python

### Suggestions

Following up on PR #9265 and the [pyre-check.org](https://pyre-check.org/), it seems more appropriate to rename the node’s title to “Pyrefly” for better consistency.

issue.title: Support "?category=" filter on "/guides" (e.g. "/guides?category=textual")
Support "?category=" filter on "/guides" (e.g. "/guides?category=textual")

comment.body: Thanks but there are no plans for that yet. We might do that once we get to the planned redesign.
